text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump MEMPHIS, Tenn. (WMC) - Tennessee health officials announced 448 new cases of coronavirus and nine new deaths Wednesday.  Your comments and math don’t add up. This is just one state that is not considered a hotspot.
